it.gmariotti.cardslib.library.internal
Class CardThumbnail

java.lang.Object
  it.gmariotti.cardslib.library.internal.base.BaseCard
      it.gmariotti.cardslib.library.internal.CardThumbnail
All Implemented Interfaces:
CardUIInferface
public class CardThumbnail
extends BaseCard

Card Thumbnail model.

You can customize this component. See https://github.com/gabrielemariotti/cardslib/tree/master/doc/THUMBNAIL.md for more information.

Load a image from a Resource ID or an URL.

Usage: 

     //Create thumbnail
     CardThumbnail thumb = new CardThumbnail(getActivity().getApplicationContext());

     //Set resource
     thumb.setDrawableResource(R.drawable.carddemo_ic_gmaps_large);

     //Add thumbnail to a card
     card.addCardThumbnail(thumb);
or 

     //Set resource
     thumb.setUrlResource("https://mydomain.com/photo.jpg");
You can easily extend and customize this class providing your inner layout and setting your values with setupInnerViewElements(android.view.ViewGroup, android.view.View) method. 


 public class CustomThumbCard extends CardThumbnail {

 public CustomThumbCard(Context context) {
 super(context);
 }

     CardThumbnail


public CardThumbnail(android.content.Context context,
                     int innerLayout)

 

     
ThumbnailCard doesn't provide a Thumbnail Inner Layout.
         Don't use it!
         

         

             
Parameters:
             
context - context
             
innerLayout - layout resource ID
